attributes.action: Need to ban TV soaps like East Enders, Coronation Street, Emerdale Farm & Holy Oaks on TV.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These soaps demonstrate so much negative social behaviours in Britain. These programs should be replaced by motivational programs & self help guide for adults & children. Instead of showing broken families in soaps, programs on how to build families & relationship should be replaced. Please we need more education programs replaced to help our children & our future with a more positive view to life.
